Hi Eugene ( @ebrevdo ), is there any update on inpute_finished=True in dynamic_decode with a BeamSearchDecoder ?

I still have this problem on tf1.4 and cannot tell how correct it is to have it on False, judging from the docstring. It says that the gradient back-propagation would be wrong for a padded batch, but we cannot use the BeamSearchDecoder in training anyway.

Hi Eugene ( @ebrevdo ), is there any update on `inpute_finished=True` in dynamic_decode with a BeamSearchDecoder ? 

I still have this problem on tf1.4 and cannot tell how correct it is to have it on False, judging from the docstring. It says that the gradient back-propagation would be wrong for a padded batch, but we cannot use the BeamSearchDecoder in training anyway.
